Untuk tujuan ini, kami telah mendedikasikan 7,14% (~ 18 juta GBTC) dari pasokan Token GBTC yang dijual yaitu 250 juta GBTC - satu GigBit Token berharga $ 0,248 selama ICO. Kampanye Bounti akan berjalan hingga akhir ICO dan poolnya akan dibagi sebagai berikut:  45% (8,100,000 GBTC) untuk Bitcointalk Signature Campaign [BitcoinTalk] ~ ~ $2,008,800  10% (1,800,000 GBTC) untuk Twitter Campaign ~ $446,400  10% (1,800,000 GBTC) untuk Chase Your Dream Contest Campaign ~ $446,400  10% (1,800,000 GBTC) untuk Facebook Campaign ~ $446,400  10% (1,800,000 GBTC) untuk Blog/Media Campaign ~ $446,400  5% (900,000 GBTC) untuk Translation Campaign ~ $223,200  10% (1,800,000 GBTC) untuk YouTube Campaign ~ $446,400  10% (1,800,000GBTC) untuk Airdrop Campaign ~ $446,400  Stakes untuk tiap campaigns akan diupdate setiap weekend.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: 🔥Breaking News 🔥  ➡️Dear Community Members,  As you all have noticed already, the last few months have been like a rollercoaster ride for crypto market and also for GigTricks. A ride filled with joy, excitement and even disappointment at some points. But what really makes a rollercoaster amazing is that while it goes to its extreme low, it always shoots to the top afterward. Letting you experience the goosebumps of excitement and a feeling of known satisfaction.  That’s how we define our journey right from the start of the ICO since 2018. And we know you can relate with us on many levels yourself. But we are delighted that a celebration time is at hand as GigBit Token [GBTC] is all set to get listed on P2PB2B exchange  [under top 20 exchange as per coinmarketcap daily volume of $450+million/day] in the next two weeks with an ICO price 1 GBTC = $0.248  We cannot thank you enough for your continuous support and trust in GigTricks. We believe that this announcement is only the start of a new & revolutionized era for entrepreneurs and freelancers alike. We look forward to celebrate with you more good news.  Hence, we call out all our token buyers, sponsors, bounty hunters and private contributors to visit https://p2pb2b.io/ now and register there!  In the end, I would recommend all of you to have trust in our team and keep HODL GBTC as this will provide you great benefits in coming months  To more future JOY & Success 🥂  Amir Shaikh CEO of GigTricks Group GigTricks.io

Author: yuvadeep
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: GigTricks designed to create a freelance platform with an upgraded version and added modern technologies to offer the chance, reduce the risk and create a successful plan for all the stakeholders involved in it.  Main aim and objective of the GigTricks are to design freelance websites with normal fees. GigTricks main aim is to create functional, available and a low-cost freelance platform that will give many benefits like other countries.  All the profiles are verified by the users and SMEs are not in a position to afford complete workplace or appoint permanent employees. Therefore, they have a chance to hire talented and skillful individuals for all specific tasks within their projects.  GigTricks will find to serve their clients with the help of blockchain technology and smart contracts to avoid unprofessional freelancers and who are going to sign up the projects with great excitement at an initial stage. GigTricks is a platform that helps in both the freelancers and the clients where all the talented people can meet and share their ideas, hard work and helps them to develop their skills by hiring them for projects. At the same time clients, shows their trust and interest in freelancers which doesn't create harm to the GigTricks platform. However, GigTricks shows their interest to achieve its aim is to create a truthful and specialized environment.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hey skovbitcoin ,  Yes, with each platform of GigTricks, freelance will be able to benefit more from the ecosystem. For instance, at GigTricks Marketplace you can only market your service, but GigTricks Pro you will be able to have your professional profile with all order history, individual skill rating and reviews. With the help of GigTricks Learning you can acquire in-demand skills, whereas GigTricks Point of Sale Device (PoS) will let you complete your orders for local clients. On the other hand, GigTricks Social will give you an ability to interact with people and earn tokens for sharing or streaming the content.  Moreover, GigTricks Learning aims to be an open platform where mentors, instructors, teachers and experienced professionals can upload their course products which will be visible to a community of millions. Users can gain access to these courses using GigBit Tokens. Whenever any user attends an online course, they will need to pass the exam in order to earn skills points which will be added to their GigTricks Pro profile.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi Hoanghai You're absolutely right. A centralized system at any freelancing platform is a nightmare for both the client and freelancer. And yes, you all are right in your understanding, GigTricks is implementing a decentralized approach throughout its ecosystem. At GigTricks Social, the content poster, the viewer will get GBTC Tokens because of the advertisements.  In contrary, the existing platforms keep all the benefit and earnings to themselves and also charge commission on the gig. Similarly, our dispute management system is also an example of the decentralized approach. Users will be able to see the Geo-Location and other information about the freelancer/client while on the centralized platform this information is only available for the centralized authorities!

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi mooccowmoo!  Thank you for your trust in GigTricks!  Just to add up in your knowledge about GigTricks Point of Sale (PoS) devices, they are connected directly with GigTricks Blockchain. The aim is to make it easier for entrepreneurs to sell their goods or services and the goods will be paid by GBTC making it all secure and safe. For example, if a training provider has to offer his course locally at his physical institute, he will first launch the offline or online course in the GigTricks Learning Platform. Subsequently, by using the GigTricks PoS device, the user will be able to start sales at his physical location and clients will be able to pay for the course or any product or service using GigBit Tokens.  Freelancers can also use the GigTricks PoS devices to receive payment for the services rendered by them for any offline clients, the sales ratings will also be recorded in GigTricks Blockchain for any offline orders. This will give the freelancer more credibility and will also boost their overall sales by bringing more orders into their profiles from offline sales.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi ,  GigTricks will use GigBit credit for small transactions but there are some more functionalities to consider.  The sequence of events includes the following:  -- The user will confirm the conversion, and that amount of GigBit credits is locked for further usage by Hyperledger chaincode. -- When peers confirm the transaction (consensus), Hyperledger chaincode triggers GigBit tokens transfer transaction in Ethereum smart contract. -- If the Ethereum transaction was executed successfully, GigBit credits are burnt, and GigBit tokens are sent to the user’s address. In case of any issues with sending this transaction on Ethereum Blockchain, the transaction is rolled back, unlocking the amount in Hyperledger chaincode for further usage.

Using the PoS device, the client will be able to make payment through any debit/credit card as well as any other crypto tokens that will be converted into GigBit Token at the backend in real-time. Additionally, all offline orders record will also be stored in the user’s GigTricks Pro profile and local orders can also write reviews for you whose score will be added to user’s overall rating and skill rating.  How amazing it will be to have an integrated profile for both offline & online orders. Let me give you a moment to ponder upon it.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: GigTricks (PreICO) An Integrated 360° Freelance & On-Demand Ecosystem The freelance and on-demand economy are lacking the principle standards to form a trusting business relationship between clients and freelancers. To solve this problem, GigTricks has built a blockchain-based ecosystem to increase transparency, trust, and reliability among the platform participants. Every action including review and skill ratings will be verified within the immutable blockchain. As such, nothing can be forged within the ecosystem. The GigTricks objective is to create the world’s first 360° freelance and on-demand ecosystem which will be trusted by a community of millions. Ultimately, we’ve built the GigTricks platform to help fight global recession by creating unlimited opportunities for talented individuals so that they can simply find the gigs, work from home, generate income and spend on their consumer needs resulting a true economic growth.  source: https://icobench.com/ico/gigtricks

Body: Hi there,  All the token details are on our website under the section of Technical Specifications. Here's the website: https://www.gigtricks.io/  For your quick information, below are the token details:  Token Name           > Gigbit Token Token Abbreviation > GBTC Max Supply            > 1,000,000,000 Token Type            > ERC 20 Token Minimum Goal        > 2.5 Million Usd Hardcap                 > 35 Million Usd Token Value           > 1 Gbtc = 0.24800 Usd Unsold Tokens        > Will Be Destroyed Key Benefits           > Tradable Utility Tokens Token Distribution   > Immediately Available

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello Everyone!   Following are the key reasons that made GigTricks use the Hyperledger Fabric in order to make the Ecosystem secured, trusted and scalable for the community members:  1. The use of Hyperledger Fabric will allow the Ecosystem participants to store and share their data and information privately within the participating nodes of the Blockchain.  2. Its practice of collaborative software development approach ensure transparency i.e. it does not let public access to the personal data but it will allow other Ecosystem members to access certain data based on the settings and protocol defined.  3. For the secure transaction, GigTricks will use the Ethereum Technology, but to prevent the incurring transaction fee, the Hyperledger Fabric will be there to assist the Ecosystem.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi Everyone! Just to add some information in your discussions, GigTricks will make money as per the following structure:  -->> GigTricks Marketplace, Point of Sale and Learning – A platform % fee in GBTC tokens will be charged from each seller orders. -->> GigTricks PRO – A platform fixed fee in GBTC tokens will be charged for skill verification for every profile. -->> GigTricks Social – Using social is free. -->> Advertisement Revenue – GigTricks will encourage the advertisers to place ads across its all platforms.  Our Pre-ICO is LIVE do support us by making your contributions at https://www.gigtricks.io/

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi Bakst2 ,  Your statement is enough to tell us that you are unaware about GigTricks or may be you haven't read our whitepaper ... GigTricks is using Blockchain Technology in all of its five innovative products that will be integrated into a single ecosystem and leverage from each other to increase transparency, trust, and reliability among platform participants. Here are the following 5 products:  - GigTricks PRO (A Blockchain based verified resume portal where you can showcase your skills) - GigTricks Learning (A learning platform where you can learn and earn blockchain based verified skill) - GigTricks Social (A social platform for a purpose - freelancers can earn coins by contributing and interacting with other community members) - GigTricks Marketplace (Ultimately a blockchain based marketplace where now buyers not only can see overall profile ratings but also they can filter the skill ratings and can find the best talent for their business) - GigTricks Point of Sale (POS) - (a point of sale machine which allows every freelancer or professional to start a business locally by using GigTricks PoS device and all local orders will boost their online profile as well)  Moreover, GigTricks will be a decentralized system and will empower the community members, our dispute management system is one of the best examples of our decentralized functionalities.

Using Hyperledger Fabric ensures that when the transaction is submitted by a buyer and a freelancer, it’s saved in the Ledger and executed according to the smart contract that guarantees the rights of a participant in the transaction.

Body: Hi there  GigTricks is aiming to introduce a premium user model and will reward its users who hold more than 10,000 GBTC tokens for more than one month at any given time and these users will get access to premium features as listed below but not limited to:  --> Allow only freelancers from selected geographical locations to apply for your jobs --> See who viewed your profile --> Detailed analysis of your profile --> Get only top-rated freelancers to apply for your job --> Job post will be rank higher in the search engine --> Freelancers will be ranked higher in our search engine --> Early access to any platform deals and/or coupons. --> Generate invoice for the national tax service.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi Everyone Our aim is to enhance content search by using metadata. Smart contracts prove to be an ideal method for content management because the contract will be executed only if all parameters of a smart contract are fulfilled.  GigTricks also helps in searching the content such as audio, video, and scripts, using the metadata. Scripts can be made searchable for better targeting of content during a search process.  In addition to this, our aim is to also introduce a taxonomy structure to index content for greater accuracy in returning relevant search results.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi There . Yes, currently GigTricks fiat currency marketplace is live which was launched in Dec 2017, and its a post-revenue business. We have acquired over 2,000 customers, and our customer acquisition is growing dramatically every month. It is to be noted that GigTricks.com is not a beta product, but an actual operational fiat based marketplace which is already generating revenue. GigTricks has also launched its fiat currency based iOS and Android apps which are fully operational and in use. However, after our ICO will be over, the initial development of our ecosystem will be started. It is expected that once the Blockchain version of GigTricks Marketplace will be launched, all the dealing and transactions there will be handled in the GigBit Tokens.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi  Freelancers or service businesses can also use the GigTricks PoS devices to receive payment for the services rendered by them for any offline clients. Clients can pay for services or products using GigBit Tokens, and the sales ratings will also be recorded in GigTricks Blockchain for any offline orders. This will give the freelance and/or on-demand service businesses more credibility and will also boost their overall sales by bringing more orders into their profiles from offline sales.  We hope to be able to integrate the Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dash, etc. a form of payment using GigTricks PoS device. The GigTricks PoS will automatically convert these currencies, by using 3rd party exchanges, into GigBit Tokens.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi  GigTricks Learning intends to become the global online center of excellence where entrepreneurs and freelancers can acquire the best skills and enhance their business and professional expertise for greater success. It’ll be an open platform where mentors, instructors, teachers and experienced professionals can upload their courses which will be visible to a community of millions.  Users can gain access to these courses using GigBit Tokens. Whenever any user attends an online course, they will need to pass the exam in order to add that particular skill along with its rating to the GigTricks Pro profile.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello GigTricks aspires to be a platform that solves as much hurdles it can for its users. The chat service will allow interaction between the buyers and sellers. The chat service is categorized into two types: public groups and private sessions, where the buyers and sellers can discuss and trade products or services.  Another way for sellers reach a wider audience would be the advertising feature, GigTricks enables the sellers and other advertisers to promote their products and/or services through advertising on user interfaces. GigBit Tokens would be used to pay for advertising services.  Our system will enable advertising to be added to any content in the form of pre-roll, mid-roll, and displayed ads on both web and mobile platforms.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi, You guys are right. GigTricks has incorporated a decentralized content network that is capable of serving content from different locations across the globe. The system is decentralized and securely distributes the load across a Blockchain powered network and uses consensus algorithms to synchronize with one another.  Content that is delivered can be modified to include inaudible bits of information to help protect its authors. This would serve as a digital fingerprint to thwart piracy and enable authors of content to receive a higher percentage of returns for their efforts.  We believe these features would make GigTricks a safe platform for freelancers and helpful.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi Everyone GigTricks has incorporated an authenticated review system in all GigTricks products where sellers will be rated by the buyers and the ratings would be awarded for specific skills as well as an overall profile rating.  It’s the unique selling point of GigTricks as no other platform has any feature that allows freelancers to acquire rating for their specific skills. This feature will help both buyers and sellers, freelancers can showcase their skills to acquire the best projects and clients can determine freelancers’ skills by drilling down to a granular level and ultimately hiring the best one for their project.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Quote from: PETES on June 17, 2018, 06:50:00 AM I wonder what gigtricks stand out from the others? I see the vision clearly for entrepreneurs but how can be they ensure that the data is safe? Will be ledger is enough for this?  Hi There, in the GigTricks point of view, the freelance and on-demand economy are lacking the principle standards to form a trusting business relationship between clients and freelancers. GigTricks will be seeking to build a blockchain-based ecosystem to increase transparency, trust, and reliability among platform participants (i.e. clients and freelancers) with the help of its 5 innovative products integrated into a single ecosystem and here they are :  - GigTricks PRO (A Blockchain based verified resume portal where you can showcase your skills) - GigTricks Learning (A learning platform where you can learn and earn blockchain based verified skill) - GigTricks Social (A social platform for a purpose - freelancers can earn coins by contributing and interacting with other community members) - GigTricks Marketplace (Ultimately a blockchain based marketplace where now buyers not only can see overall profile ratings but also they can filter the skill ratings and can find the best talent for their business) - GigTricks Point of Sale (POS) - (a point of sale machine which allows every freelancer or professional to start a business locally by using GigTricks PoS device and all local orders will boost their online profile as well)  Therefore, we will scale and increase the trust level by revolutionizing the freelance and on-demand community with the help of blockchain technology. All transactions and the review system within the blockchain will be immutable therefore, the ecosystem will be robust and tamper-proof for storing data. Moreover, disputes and the review system will be handled in a decentralized fashion, thus increasing the sense of trust among the community members.  With the leverage of blockchain technology GigTricks will maximize trust and transparency for all ecosystem participants, just like freelancers will feel more secure while taking on the gigs as no one can wrong them; entrepreneurs will be more confident while hiring freelancers as they cannot get away with their unprofessionalism and unethical behavior that cost small businesses their time. And just to give your answer, GigTricks is already live with its marketplace, it is essentially a badge of authenticity for us that we don't cease to flaunt!  People are investing in our ICO because just as our main sale will end, within 4 weeks of time, our GBTC tokens are expected to be listed on the exchanges. Meaning that the investors will be able to sell their tokens if they wish to. However, we encourage people for holding tokens for longer period of time since it can get them huge return on their investment.  So in conclusion, we are not launching GigTricks Ecosystem only to become a little better than the existing platforms 😊, we are here to revolutionize the freelance and on-demand economy and that is why we have thought of all our innovative features in a way that can bring the most benefit for freelancers/sellers and clients/buyers. And yes, we don't need to compete with anyone, when our ecosystem will go live, its features will attract people globally to leverage the on-demand industry.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi,  The existing freelancing platforms fail to acknowledge dispute fairly because disputes are handled in a centralized manner. However, GigTricks seek to solve this problem by giving power back to the community where the top performing users both from buyers and sellers sides will get a chance to participate in the dispute management process by using their votes in return of incentive in the form of GigBit Tokens which will encourage all community members to participate actively.  GigTricks believes that introducing a fee in order to enter the voting process is not an attractive approach and at the same time we have to deal with the spam voters as well.

Consider a platform that has a central authority that works like a jury and the sole administration of the community, all the decisions are taken by that central authority and all the profits go to that central authority, the people that make the community progress are treated nothing more like another entity and their is no way that they can see any growth in their experience at the platform all they experience is the increasing crowd and the fight to earn their bread. Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi GigTricks is a blockchain based ecosystem with 5 unique and innovative platforms all integrated to leverage from each other. You can have a social account at GigTricks Social, share and view content there and look after your social need without wasting your time on social media websites that do not benefit you much in return.  Similarly, you can also have a professional profile at GigTricks Pro, here you can maintain your order history online/offline, your reviews by clients, your individual skill ratings, overall profile rating and create the ultimate profile to pitch for future opportunities. Whereas, at GigTricks Learning you can get access to valuable courses to increase your competitive advantage in the industry and add a new skill set to your profile.  At the marketplace, you can market your services while with GigTricks PoS you can complete local orders and take payment in fiat or other cryptocurrencies that will be converted into GigBit tokens in real-time. Therefore, it is not wrong to say you will have all of your major profiles within your reach

Body: I remember reading about a story of a dispute management failure by one freelancer working on upwork for past four years and having a great 5-star rating. That user claimed that he is a freelancer and a few months back worked on $300 project, and negotiated terms with the client to work on hourly basis. The client agreed, the project done and submitted even feedback received and after a month he received a message from the support team to return the money because that client is not happy, I was stunned to read that. Because that freelancer seemed so exploited, he said he never thought things like that could have happened and the sad story is that the upwork support team does not even care to talk to the freelancer, they just asked to return the money.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hey Everyone. GigTricks will make money as per the following structure:  •   GigTricks Marketplace, Point of Sale and Learning – A platform % fee in GBTC tokens will be charged from each seller orders. •   GigTricks PRO – A platform fixed fee in GBTC tokens will be charged for skill verification for every profile. •   GigTricks Social – Using social is free. •   Advertisement Revenue – GigTricks will encourage the advertisers to place ads across its all platforms.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi, you're right about this. Well, just to let you know that GigTricks is aiming to introduce a premium user model and will reward its users who hold more than 10,000 GBTC Tokens for more than one month at any given specified time.  These users will get access to premium features as listed below but not limited to:  1. Allow only freelancers from selected geographical locations to apply for your jobs 2. See who viewed your profile 3. Detailed analysis of your profile 4. Get only top-rated freelancers to apply for your job 5. Job post will be rank higher in the search engine 6. Freelancers will be ranked higher in our search engine 7. Early access to any platform deals and/or coupons.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: The individual skill rating will allow freelancers to have a proper breakdown of all their expertise with their specific rating that will be verified under the blockchain with the help of skill tests.  We aim to allow freelancers to add their rate for each skill service. It will help both the freelancers and buyer interested in any of the services. Just to give you an example, if a client wants to hire you for any of your offered services, he will check your skills and their expertise level as well as the charges you expect to get. It will cut down the negotiation and communication time to a great level.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello everyone, GigTricks do not take commission from freelancer gigs and the transaction charges will be minimal because of the crypto utility token GBTC and blockchain technology. Just to answer your question, we will generate revenue from advertisements, and charge a platform fee on GigTricks Pro, GigTricks Marketplace, GigTricks Learning and GigTricks PoS.  Good news is that GigTricks Social will be free and users can earn GBTC tokens their for sharing and viewing content. Our Pre-Sale Power Hour will go live on 1st July 2018 and the KYC is already live. Better to do your KYC now and avail 65% OFF on the Pre-Sale Power Hour.

Body: "the evolved blockchain technology that need special permissions to read, access, and write information on them is called the permissioned blockchain. The intrinsic configuration of such blockchains controls the participants' transactions and defines their roles in which each participant can access and contribute to the blockchain. It may also include maintaining the identity of each blockchain participant on the network. "

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hey There!  GigTricks understand the value of trust and transparency in all of its platforms. Therefore, at GigTricks Learning, every course posted and the seller will be initially auto-rated then a team of oracles will thoroughly review each course and rate it and finally, the freelancers/buyers acquiring these courses will have the power to rate and review it. The team of oracles will be the senior most ecosystem participants from both parties who have proven track record in the ecosystem.  Moreover, the process to rate by oracles will be incentivized i.e. they will get a reward in GBTC for reviewing and rating courses. This whole process will create ultimate trust as well as uplift and maintain the quality of active courses available at all time.

Body: Hey  GigTricks Escrow service would ensure that the freelancer will provide the requested service in accordance with the agreed contract and the GigBit tokens from the escrow will be released to the freelancer as soon as they deliver the service and the buyer reviews and accepts it. Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hey Everyone!  During the ICO sales period, the tokens will be offered at the single price of $0.24800/GBTC. Payment is allowed through various currencies and credit cards and the number of allocated tokens would depend on the exchange rates of the currency between the moment that the order is validated by the customer and the reception of the customer’s payment. Same applies to if the customer wishes to purchase GigBit tokens against other crypto tokens, order will be calculated on the basis of the chosen crypto token exchange rate at the moment when the reception of the customer’s payment is confirmed.  In addition to that, The entire amount will be due and payable at the moment of the order. The ordered tokens will only be allocated and delivered upon receipt of payment. The payment will be considered to have been made when GigTricks cashes the effective price. Early payment will not lead to a discount!

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅

This was all about the market, now let's shed light on GigTricks Big Bang Theory. First of all what we realize that freelance and on-demand ecosystem is lacking the integration within the ecosystem and that's the exact problem we are trying to solve by bringing the LEVERAGE element among all platforms.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi,  These are the platforms:  - GigTricks PRO (A Blockchain based verified resume portal where you can showcase your skills)  - GigTricks Learning (A learning platform where you can learn and earn blockchain based verified skill)  - GigTricks Social (A social platform for a purpose - freelancers can earn coins by contributing and interacting with other community members)  - GigTricks Marketplace (Ultimately a blockchain based marketplace where now buyers not only can see overall profile ratings but also they can filter the skill ratings and can find the best talent for their business)  - GigTricks Point of Sale (POS) - (a point of sale machine which allows every freelancer or professional to start a business locally by using GigTricks PoS device and all local orders will boost their online profile as well)  And what we mean from leveraging concept is that, if a user registers at GigTricks Pro and take skill tests to verify his existing skills then he can further increase his experience and profile credibility by taking new skill courses at GigTricks Learning. This way Pro is leveraging from the product Learning. It's only one example to clear your concept about what GigTricks is all about.

Body: Hey There!  GigTricks will reward its user base through a gamification process. There are many events in which the users will be rewarded:  -- Sign up with GigTricks -- Sharing content in social circle -- High rated skill ratings -- High rated profile ratings -- Quality content creator        -- Top-rated sellers -- Encourage Advertiser to advertise on the platform -- Growing fan base -- Monthly spend on the platform -- Being a part of proof-of-streaming process -- Contribute to dispute management process -- Active members with high degree of engagement within the platform  The main goal is to make sure our user base is happy and satisfied.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello! We agree when you say about potential threats to the world of freelancing. GigTricks has introduced internal filters to detect potentially malicious activities and in case of any fraud, appropriate action will be taken. Alongside with that, using review responses and smart contracts will help in preventing people using reviews for their own benefits. Additionally, freelancers rejecting critical reviews would have to face the dispute management system. Lastly, to help in generating more response from clients, GigBit credits will be rewarded to users who actively take part in posting constructive reviews.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi All, users can deposit GigBit tokens to their personal GigTricks account, this will help in buying of any product or service of their choice. User can pay directly using GigBit tokens or with any crypto token which will be converted into GigBit by using third-party Crypto Token conversion services.  The usage can range from subscribing to a certain product or service to paying or rewarding the freelancers they hire. Advertisers can also use Gigbit Token to buy ads and advertise their product. Based on their level of engagement within the ecosystem, users would be rewarded via Gigbit Tokens. Along with that, voters would be rewarded with GigBit tokens upon successful resolution of any disputes between buyers and sellers.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi, for incentivized voting once a dispute is initiated certain numbers of top performing buyers and sellers will be chosen randomly by the system from the voting pool who wishes to participate in the voting process in return for incentivized GigBit Tokens. Once the user accepts the request to vote he/she will submit his GigBit Tokens, which is equivalent to 0.25% of the disputed total order value, in GigTricks escrow until the resolution is made. After the consensus is achieved through the majority votes, then the system will pass the resolution in favor of the majority voters’ decision and these voters will get back their GigBit Tokens which was in escrow plus the incentive GigBit tokens they earn through the successful voting process. However, at the same time, the voters who voted for the other party will be penalized, and a percentage of GigBit Token from escrow will be deducted as penalty fees, and the remainder will be refunded to them. In case 51% of these voters who are penalized wish to re-initiate the voting process again, then the system will initiate the voting process again.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi there, we are aiming to launch a new, open, decentralized series of interconnected platforms that are dedicated to the real-time management of any freelance and on-demand economy. Our goal is to establish the fundamentals of an ecosystem that will be accessible to everyone and with the highest degree of opportunities and functionalities.  The Blockchain will offer the technical consensus mechanism detailed below, enabling data to be validated in less than 1 second, in certain scenarios. Because of the Blockchain’s open standard, it will be possible to incorporate additional feature layers and modules to extend the platform’s functionalities and possibilities: - Time limits - Payment guarantees - KYC - Legal limitations - Escrow - Instant purchase - Seller payouts - Audio and Video streaming

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello, no one is missing out on anything, it all is a bit complicated . Currently, most professional profile platforms have no verification mechanism which truly validates the skill mentioned in any profile. To overcome a possible scam in terms of mentioning skills and expertise, GigTricks has formulated a skill test. For example, if a graphic designer indicates “Adobe Photoshop” as a skill set in his GigTricks Pro profile, then a test will appear which contains multiple choice questions as well as qualitative questions which would be checked and analysed by various algorithms. These algorithms will be tasked with correctly scoring the test and provide an accurate skill rating. If a person passes the test, then the overall score will be assigned to his skill which can later be verified by anyone within the GigTricks system.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi , each of your concerns are valid and we’re glad we’ve such alert and on guard prospective customers. Each time a professional adds a skill to their GigTricks Pro profile, they will pay a small skill fee using GigBit Tokens. The fees per skill are kept to a minimum in order to encourage people to build their online Blockchain based profiles. However, using a fee structure will strongly deter any spam or non-serious persons, thus drastically reducing the likelihood of on boarding low-quality freelancers.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi Everyone! GigTricks Point of Sale (PoS) devices are connected directly with GigTricks Blockchain. The aim is to make it easier for entrepreneurs to sell their goods or services and the goods will be paid by GBTC making it all secure and safe. For example, if a training provider has to offer his course locally at his physical institute, he will first launch the offline or online course in the GigTricks Learning Platform. Subsequently, by using the GigTricks PoS device, the user will be able to start sales at his physical location and clients will be able to pay for the course or any product or service using GigBit Tokens. Freelancers can also use the GigTricks PoS devices to receive payment for the services rendered by them for any offline clients, the sales ratings will also be recorded in GigTricks Blockchain for any offline orders. This will give the freelancer more credibility and will also boost their overall sales by bringing more orders into their profiles from offline sales.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hey there, in the freelancing world the major challenge that arises are disputes between client and freelancers due to contracts, most of the contracts are verbal or simply written up as quotes or bids and can be altered by unethical parties creating issues that may endanger the money spent or the entire project.  To overcome this, GigTricks has introduced smart contracts. When a freelancer and client agree on a work product, timelines for completion, and fee amounts, this agreement can be entered into a block where it is unchangeable; this eliminates the majority of contract disputes and provides full transparency.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi,  😊 we are glad that all of you are taking interest in knowing about GigTricks and its feature and cannot thank you all enough. Yes, you all are right in your understanding, GigTricks is implementing a decentralized approach throughout its ecosystem. At GigTricks Social, the content poster, the viewer will get GBTC because advertisements. in contrary, the existing platforms keep all the benefit and earnings to themselves and also charge commission on the gig. Similarly our dispute management system is also an example of the decentralized approach. Thank you 😊

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: We at GigTricks are well aware of the issues faced by freelancers. One of the major issues being not having control over their work product and proof of the work they have completed. To overcome this, all of the data can be entered into a block, along with the freelancer’s profile, real examples of work, positive reviews from clients, etc. It is permanently there. And if one wishes to enter new information, then entering it into a new block is always an option. We believe these solutions will help freelancers lead a better career.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hey there  , here's how the review will work, once the automatic review filtering process has been successfully completed, the review will then pass on to the product owner/freelancer who will be able to moderate the review by either approving or rejecting it. It is to be noted that regardless of the user’s individual opinion, the review will still be visible to all users and will be stored within the GigTricks Blockchain.  In addition, the product owner/freelancer will have the ability to provide a response to any non-constructive review in order to justify his position; the responses made will be visible to all users. Additionally, if a seller rejects a review, the review rating will be assigned to only the specific skill however, if a seller accepts the review then the review score will contribute in the overall profile rating so there is a benefit for manual filtration for freelancers!

Author: DMAllera
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello, if a freelancer begins to reject any and all critical reviews, then the following two things will happen:  a. If any suspicions arise regarding any of the reviews, then the review will enter into the dispute management process where the community will decide (via voting) whether the rejection is valid or not.  b. Similarly, the buyers will have the ability to raise a dispute against any review rejection that in turn will trigger the community voting system of dispute management process.

Body: Hello! Royalty payment means if a user creates a content that another GigTricks user wishes to use then the second user will have to give royalty payment in GBTC to the content creator. It will mainly happen at GigTricks Social Platform since it will be the major platform for content sharing for the ecosystem participants.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi GigTricks is aiming to introduce a premium user model and will reward its users who hold more than 10,000 GBTC Tokens for more than one month at any given time and these users will get access to premium features as listed below but not limited to:  - Allow only freelancers from selected geographical locations to apply for your jobs - See who viewed your profile - Detailed analysis of your profile - Get only top-rated freelancers to apply for your job - Job post will be rank higher in the search engine - Freelancers will be ranked higher in our search engine - Early access to any platform deals and/or coupons.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi, 😊 GigTricks understand the value of trust and transparency in all of its platforms. Therefore, at GigTricks Learning every course posted and the seller will be initially auto-rated then a team of oracles will thoroughly review each course and rate it and finally, the freelancers/buyers acquiring these courses will have the power to rate and review it. The team of oracles will be the senior most ecosystem participants from both parties who have proven track record in the ecosystem. Moreover, the process to rate by oracles will be incentivized i.e. they will get a reward in GBTC for reviewing and rating courses. This whole process will create ultimate trust as well as uplift and maintain the quality of active courses available at all time.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hello! The individual skill rating will allow freelancers to have a proper breakdown of all their expertise with their specific rating that will be verified under the Blockchain with the help of skill tests. We aim to allow freelancers to add their rate for each skill service. It will help both of the freelancers and buyers interested in any of the services.  For instance, if a client wants to hire you for any of your offered services, he will check your skills and their expertise level as well as the charges you expect to get. It will cut down the negotiation and communication time to a great level.

Body: Hi, freelancers or service businesses can use GigTricks PoS devices to receive payment for the services rendered by them for any offline clients. Clients can pay for services or products using GigBit Tokens, and the sales ratings will also be recorded in GigTricks Blockchain for any offline orders. This will give the freelance and/or on-demand service businesses more credibility and will also boost their overall sales by bringing more orders into their profiles from offline sales!

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi, if a freelancer begins to reject any and all critical reviews, then the following two things will happen:  a.  If any suspicions arise regarding any of the reviews, then the review will enter into the dispute management process where the community will then review and decide (via voting) whether the rejection is valid or not.  b.  Similarly, the buyers will have the ability to raise a dispute against any review rejection that in turn will trigger the community voting system of dispute management process.  Qualifying for voting process criteria for freelancers/professionals include: - Skills score ratings - Freelancer profile ratings - Freelancer earnings - Freelancer followers  Similarly, following criteria will be considered for buyers: - Transaction history - Regional location - Buyers followers.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Alright, so here's the full description guys, this is what will happen after the voting process takes place.  The system will pass the resolution in favor of the majority voters’ decision and these voters will get back their GigBit Tokens which was in escrow plus the incentive GigBit tokens they earn through the successful voting process. However, at the same time, the voters who voted for the other party will be penalized, and a percentage of GigBit Token from escrow will be deducted as penalty fees, and the remainder will be refunded to them. If 51% of these voters who are penalized wish to re-initiate the voting process again, then the system will initiate the voting process again with all new members again to achieve ultimate transparency!

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Yes, GigTricks will use GigBit credit for small transactions but there are some more functionalities to consider.  The sequence of events includes:  -The user will confirm the conversion, and that amount of GigBit credits is locked for further usage by Hyperledger Chaincode. -When peers confirm the transaction (consensus), Hyperledger Chaincode triggers GigBit tokens transfer transaction in Ethereum smart contract. -If the Ethereum transaction was executed successfully, GigBit credits are burnt, and GigBit tokens are sent to the user’s address. In case of any issues with sending this transaction on Ethereum Blockchain, the transaction is rolled back, unlocking the amount in Hyperledger Chaincode for further usage.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi, GigTricks aims to create an ecosystem in which all five products, GigTricks Marketplace, Pro, Learning, Social and PoS will be integrated to leverage from each other. Here, freelancers will have the ability to register to a a Blockchain verified Pro profile, connect with potential clients, add new skills by taking courses at GigTricks Learning, Socialize at GigTricks Social and earn GBTC for sharing and viewing content, and will be able to have an integrated profile for both offline and online clients thanks to GigTricks PoS device. For further detials you can check our website gigtricks.io

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅

Gigtricks will also let buyer to rate the user and the review will be stored in the blockchain and so does the individual skill rating rated by the buyer. Meaning that, now sellers will be evaluated for their specific skills as well as for an overall rating.

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Hi everyone, GigTricks seeks to incorporate an authenticated review system in all GigTricks products where seller can be rated by the buyer and the rating will be done with respect to specific skills as well as for overall profile. Its ultimately a unique selling proposition of GigTricks, no other platform has any feature that allow freelancers to acquire rating for their specific skills. This feature will help buyers and sellers alike, wonder how? Now freelancers can leverage their skills to the fullest to acquire the best suitable gigs on the other hand clients can now determine freelancers by drilling down to a granular level increasing the chances to hire the best talent for each gig.

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Thanks for your message. You are absolutely correct everybody has the same model! What we realize that freelance and on-demand ecosystem is lacking the integration within the ecosystem and that's the exact problem we are trying to solve by bringing the LEVERAGE element among all platforms such as:  GigTricks PRO (A Blockchain based verified resume portal where you can showcase your skills) GigTricks Learning (A learning platform where you can learn and earn blockchain based verified skill) GigTricks Social (A social platform for a purpose - freelancers can earn coins by contributing and interacting with other community members) GigTricks Marketplace (Ultimately a blockchain based marketplace where now buyers not only can see overall profile ratings but also they can filter the skill ratings and can find the best talent for their business) GigTricks Point of Sale (POS) - (a point of sale machine which allows every freelancer or professional to start a business locally by using GigTricks PoS device and all local orders will boost their online profile as well)  It may look too much! but I would definitely recommend to see our video explainer on https://www.gigtricks.io/

The sole purpose of bigdata automation is to make sure that your data which is transactional data and unstructured data which is your internet-based data is feasible to companies for both internal and external usages in great volume. In this way, it supports the professional sales pitches and facilitates decision making and strategic management using synergy. It also creates unique innovation in new business areas and in making corporate procedures reliable. Bigdata automation makes all the innovation possible in various aspects.  Before we jump on to justify that big data automation is essential today, let’s first understand the basics of what bigdata actually is and how it works.  https://medium.com/gigtricks/why-is-bigdata-automation-essential-be994c006374

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Thanks for your message. You are absolutely correct everybody has the same model! What we realize that freelance and on-demand ecosystem is lacking the integration within the ecosystem and that's the exact problem we are trying to solve by bringing the LEVERAGE element among all platforms such as:  GigTricks PRO (A Blockchain based verified resume portal where you can showcase your skills) GigTricks Learning (A learning platform where you can learn and earn blockchain based verified skill) GigTricks Social (A social platform for a purpose - freelancers can earn coins by contributing and interacting with other community members) GigTricks Marketplace (Ultimately a blockchain based marketplace where now buyers not only can see overall profile ratings but also they can filter the skill ratings and can find the best talent for their business) GigTricks Point of Sale (POS) - (a point of sale machine which allows every freelancer or professional to start a business locally by using GigTricks PoS device and all local orders will boost their online profile as well)  It may look too much! but I would definitely recommend to see our video explainer on https://www.gigtricks.io/

Author: Makleyhill
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: 2 Simple Ways to Keep Track of Time while Freelancing?  The way people used to work and manage themselves is evolving with the changing work habits. The unconventional workforce has its privileges and the potential to create job opportunities. However, when there is no one around to supervise, you sometimes become laid back in completing the gig till another day and it may badly affect your income, reputation, and growth as a freelancer. You must manage your time in an efficient manner to leverage the most out of the opportunities at hand.  As a freelancer time is equivalent to money, being an enterprise in oneself freelancers are required to manage their time effectively to optimize their performance and earnings. If a freelancer cannot measure the time, then he cannot know his worth. Before signing up for any project it is crucial that the freelancer analyze and evaluate that how much time the project will take to complete and how much effort will go into the project completion. For new freelancers, however it is a difficult task, but to stay in business and succeed, understanding time and its value are vital. https://medium.com/gigtricks/2-simple-ways-to-keep-track-of-time-while-freelancing-b451254610cb  How Time Management Can Make a Difference? As a freelancer, things that matter are your skills but to utilize your skills, your time management skills must be optimum. It does not matter if you are a content writer that is creating ideas and jotting them down or a graphic designer in charge to respond ideas through images, graph, infographics, and art, or even a web designer who creates corporate websites or fashion blogs. Whatever your skills are, as a freelancer time tracking must be your priority. It is crucial otherwise achieving your goal within the deadline will become a nightmare.  So, to make your life a less hectic and more organized; and to help you out in completing more gigs in less time, here are two simple approaches.  1. Go Traditional — Measure Your Work 1.1 Set Your Milestone 2. Be Techy in Your Time Management 2.1 Be Smart with Time Tracking Apps 2.2 Be Creative — Follow Both Approaches  https://medium.com/gigtricks/2-simple-ways-to-keep-track-of-time-while-freelancing-b451254610cb

Author: gigtricks
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN][MAINSALE] GIGTRICKS - A CRYPTO ECOSYSTEM FOR FREELANCERS✅✅✅
Body: Thanks for your message. You are absolutely correct everybody has the same model! What we realize that freelance and on-demand ecosystem is lacking the integration within the ecosystem and that's the exact problem we are trying to solve by bringing the LEVERAGE element among all platforms such as:  GigTricks PRO (A Blockchain based verified resume portal where you can showcase your skills) GigTricks Learning (A learning platform where you can learn and earn blockchain based verified skill) GigTricks Social (A social platform for a purpose - freelancers can earn coins by contributing and interacting with other community members) GigTricks Marketplace (Ultimately a blockchain based marketplace where now buyers not only can see overall profile ratings but also they can filter the skill ratings and can find the best talent for their business) GigTricks Point of Sale (POS) - (a point of sale machine which allows every freelancer or professional to start a business locally by using GigTricks PoS device and all local orders will boost their online profile as well)  It may look too much! but I would definitely recommend to see our video explainer on https://www.gigtricks.io/
